admin_ids.description: A list of group admin user ids. If sent as a string, should be comma-delimited.
admin_ids.x-ms-summary: A list of group admin user ids. If sent as a string, should be comma-delimited.

user_ids.description: A list of user ids. If sent as a string, should be comma-delimited.
user_ids.x-ms-summary: A list of user ids. If sent as a string, should be comma-delimited.

$ul: **admin_ids**: Comma-delimited list of user IDs who are group administrators (separated by commas)
**user_ids**: Comma-delimited list of user IDs who belong to this group (separated by commas)
**usernames**: Comma-delimited list of usernames who belong to this group (separated by commas)
